derek-chauvin.name: Derek Chauvin
derek-chauvin.title: Police Officer
derek-chauvin.wiki: Derek Michael Chauvin is an American former police officer involved in the killing of George Floyd in Minneapolis, Minnesota on May 25, 2020. During an arrest made by Chauvin and three other officers, he knelt on George Floyd's neck for seven minutes and 46 seconds while Floyd was handcuffed and lying face down on a street.

jonathan-mattingly.name: Jonathan Mattingly
jonathan-mattingly.title: Police Officer
jonathan-mattingly.wiki: Breonna Taylor, a 26-year-old African-American emergency medical technician, was fatally shot by Louisville Metro Police Department officers on March 13, 2020. Three plainclothes LMPD officers executing a no-knock search warrant entered her apartment in Louisville, Kentucky

timothy-loehmann.name: Timothy Loehmann
timothy-loehmann.title: Police Officer
timothy-loehmann.wiki: On November 22, 2014, Tamir Rice, a 12-year old African-American boy, was killed in Cleveland, Ohio by Timothy Loehmann, a 26-year-old White-American police officer. Rice was carrying a replica toy gun; Loehmann shot him almost immediately after arriving on the scene.
